item.title: How to Edit Objects in the Microsoft Whiteboard App (Windows 11)
item.description: This tutorial covers: How to Switch to Select Mode: With Click With Keyboard How to Select an Object: With Click With Keyboard How to Select Multiple Objects: With Shift With Lasso and Click With Lasso and Keyboard With Keyboard Shortcut How to Add an Object to a Multi Selection: With Click With Keyboard How to Deselect an Object With Click With Keyboard How to Remove an Object from a Multi Selection: With Click With Keyboard No time to scroll down?
